info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 6:43AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Snow showers over Southwest MT this morning... A band of snow will move through Southwest MT this morning. Expect visibility to fall to around one half mile for a short time as the band of snow moves through. Additionally, some wind gusts near 45 mph are also possible. New snow accumulations will generally be less than one half inch at lower elevations, with an inch or two possible in the mountains. Those traveling through the Bozeman, Big Sky, Ennis and West Yellowstone areas should be alert for quickly changing road conditions and areas of poor visibility.
